course_description: An introduction to concepts and applications including: metric and normed spaces, Hilbert and Banach spaces, linear operators and functionals, compactness in metric and normed spaces, Fredholm's solvability theory, spectral theory, calculus in metric and normed spaces, selected applications.
schedule_location: MW 11:30am-12:45pm in New Psyc Bldg 235 (36 Eagle Ro
